greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle formed by reading Pascal's triangle (A007318) mod 11.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10010 (rows 0 to 140, flattened)
formula: T(n,k) = Product_i binomial(n_i, k_i) (mod 11), where n_i and k_i are the base-11 digits of n and k. (End)
maple: for n from 0 to 20 do R[n] od; # _Robert Israel_, Jan 02 2019
mathematica: Mod[ Flatten[ Table[ Binomial[n, k], {n, 0, 13}, {k, 0, n}]], 11]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 29 2004
